oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Doctor's account ledger of Confederate veteran John N. Curd
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Account of payments for medical calls made by Dr. Curd, who was in the 45th Tenn. Inf. Typical cost is $1.25 per visit. Curd practiced in Mt. Juliet, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
